content: Hello, my name is Yusuf Wijaya. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Informatics Engineering from UIN Syarif Hidayatullah, where I graduated with Cum Laude honors, I was actively engaged in several campus organizations, focusing on areas such as Informatics, Religion, and Language. Since completing my degree, I have developed a strong expertise in website development. My skills include server-side programming with Golang, PHP Native, and frameworks like Laravel and Yil2. On the client side, I am proficient in Javascript with Typescript and Angular. Additionally, I have experience with frontend frameworks such as Tailwind and Bootstrap, accumulated over more than two years of professional work and various projects.
